Text: Eimeria:  Species of this genus infect a wide variety of hosts.
Triplets:<Eimeria
2:
--------------------
<Text: Eimeria:  Thirty-one species are known to occur in bats (Chiroptera), two in turtles, and 130 named species infect fish.>
Triplets:<Eimeria
4:
--------------------
Text: Eimeria:  Five species infect llamas and alpacas: "E. alpacae", "E. ivitaensis", "E. lamae", "E. macusaniensis", and "E. punonensis".
Triplets:<Eimeria
5:
--------------------
Text: Eimeria:  A number of species infect rodents, including "E. couesii", "E. kinsellai", "E. palustris", "E. ojastii" and "E. oryzomysi".
Triplets:<Eimeria
